title: "Assignment 1-3"
---

## Introduction

I am examining a dataset of songs by Kishore Kumar

## Setup

library(tidyverse)

## Inspecting the data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(KishoreKumar1)
```

```

Columns: 7

$ `Music Director(s)` <chr> "Khemchand Prakash", "Salil Chowdhury", "O P Nayya…
$ Lyrics              <chr> "Bharat Vyas", "Shailendra", "Jan Nisar Akhtar", "…
```


:::
:::


## Data Munging


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
KishoreKumar_modified1 <- KishoreKumar1 %>% 
  janitor::clean_names(case = "snake") %>% 
  mutate(
    movie = as.factor(movie),
    song = as.factor(song),
    gem = as.factor(gem),
    singer_s = as.factor(singer_s),
    music_director_s = as.factor(music_director_s),
    lyrics = as.factor(lyrics)
  )

glimpse(KishoreKumar_modified1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Rows: 556
Columns: 7
$ year             <dbl> 1949, 1954, 1955, 1955, 1956, 1956, 1956, 1956, 1956,…
$ movie            <fct> Rimjhim, Naukri, Baap Re Baap, Munimji, Funtoosh, Fun…
$ song             <fct> Jagmag jagmag karta nikla, Chhota sa ghar hoga, Piya …
$ gem              <fct> NA, NA, NA, Picture, NA, NA, NA, NA, Picture, NA, NA,…
$ singer_s         <fct> "Kishore", "Kishore, Usha Mangeshkar", "Kishore, Asha…
$ music_director_s <fct> Khemchand Prakash, Salil Chowdhury, O P Nayyar, S D B…
$ lyrics           <fct> Bharat Vyas, Shailendra, Jan Nisar Akhtar, Sahir Ludh…
```


:::
:::


## Data Dictionary

Quantitative Data-

year (dbl): Year in which the song was released

Qualitative Data-

movie (fct): Movie in which the song featured,

song (fct): Name of the song,

gem (fct): Is the song a gem?,

singer_s (fct): Singer/ singers of the song,

music_director_s: Music director/ directors of the song,

lyrics (fct): Lyricists of the song

## Summarising the data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
skimr::skim(KishoreKumar_modified1)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}

Table: Data summary

|year          |         0|             1| 1973.36| 5.92| 1949| 1971| 1973| 1977| 1987|▁▁▃▇▂ |


:::
:::


Comments The mean year is around 1973 and there is a standard deviation of around 6 years which means most of the songs were released around that year.

## Visualising the number of songs released per year


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
KishoreKumar_modified1 %>% 
  gf_bar(~ year, color = ~gem, fill = ~gem, alpha = 0.4) %>% 
  gf_labs(x = "Year", y = "Number of songs", title = "Plot 3A: Number of Songs per Year")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Comments MOst of the songs were released in 1973. The release of songs increased gradually from the 1950s, peaked in the 70s and started decreasing after 1973.

## Visualising the data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
KishoreKumar_modified1 %>%
  dplyr::count(music_director_s) %>%
  gf_col(music_director_s ~ n, color = "blue", fill = "lightblue") %>%
  gf_labs(x = "Number of Songs", y = "Music Director", title = "Plot 3B: Music Directors Collaborating with Kishore Kumar")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Comments The chart shows that Kishore Kumar collaborated the most with R.D. Burman and also collaborated a lot with Laxmikant Pyarelal, Kalyanji Anandji, S. D. Burman and Shankar Jaikishen.

## Visualising the data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
KishoreKumar_modified1 %>%
  dplyr::count(lyrics) %>%
  gf_col(lyrics ~ n, color = "orange", fill = "orchid") %>%
  gf_labs(x = "Number of Songs", y = "Lyricists", title = "Plot 3C: Lyricists Collaborating with Kishore Kumar")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Comments The chart shows that Kishore Kumar collaborated the most with Anand Bakshi and also collaborated a lot with Majrooh Sultanpuri, Rajendra Krishan, Sahil Ludhianvi, Indeevar, Gulshan Bawra, Hasrat Jaipuri and Gulzar
